nodes.text: The Bracca resistance was a small isolated group of resistance fighters, composed of Scrapper Guild workers from Bracca, a planet under First Order occupation. One of its members was Puwanini, sister to Resistance member Pacer Agoyo, who asked for her help on behalf of General Leia Organa in a mission to steal starfighters from the scrapper planet.

Puwanini provided vital information to enable Shriv Suurgav's Dross Squadron to infiltrate Bracca, disguised as Scrapper Guild workers. But when Dross Squadron was challenged by First Order stormtroopers, Puwanini and her Scrapper Guild team came to the rescue and a firefight ensued. Puwanini led Shriv's team to Platform thirty-three G, where a number of ships that were ready to be scrapped were located. These included a T-65B X-wing, two T-70 X-wings, and a T-85 X-wing. Dross Squadron managed to escape with the X-wings, albeit losing Sanrec Stronghammer in the firefight.
